website_summaries.verdict: Individuals who deem comfort and support as must-haves during a water hike may find joy with this KEEN sandal. Indeed, its grippy outsole and lightness may also add to the satisfaction of using this footgear.However, there are some who detest it for offering such a small opening, causing annoyance when getting in and out of this sandal. All in all, the KEEN Solr may still be a credible pair for adventure junkies to invest in because of its positive attributes.
pros: Countless KEEN Solr reviews from verified buyers confirm that it is indeed a delightfully comfy hiking sandal
Its underfoot support amazes a lot of outdoor enthusiasts
A majority of shoppers shower praises unto this KEEN offering for providing heaps of grip, especially on slippery terrain
Countless customers are happy with the Solr’s lightweight construction
A few adventurers swear by the sandal’s ability to dry quickly after being submerged in water
A minority of wearers testify that its break-in period is non-existent
cons: Getting in and out of the Keen Solr is a struggle for some because of its small opening
Several users declare that its toe box is narrow
According to a handful of purchasers, some of the upper’s stitching comes apart after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Width fits narrow feet well
customer_reviews.text: The shoe length is consistent with other Keen shoes. I have a narrow, flat foot and they fit perfectly, so they might not fit other foot shapes as well.
customer_reviews.author: DeMe

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wear flip flops almost all year round. these are by far the best fit and comfort
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: The Strap does not tighten well.
customer_reviews.text: The strap does not tighten well, so the sandal gets too big to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Angel De la Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Pointy Toe Section Ruins It
customer_reviews.text: I think I would love these if not for the oddly narrow and pointy toe section. As they are now, it's a terrible fit.
customer_reviews.author: Timid Robot Zehta

customer_reviews.title: Narrow toe
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow toe. I dont have a wide foot, and my big toe sticks off the inner sole, and this would quickly get annoying when walking. Returned for different product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tratar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and great for lots of outdoor activities. Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.author: David tait

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, didn't last
customer_reviews.text: These were great sandals at first fitting nicely and very comfortable but utlimately didn't last. When I first had and user these sandal, while a little heavier than what I'm used to, they were very stylish and easy to walk around in. After couple months use, the material holding the strap down had deteriorated and my left sandal is now useless. I was only casually walking with them after work too. Can't recommend these based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Huyph4m

customer_reviews.title: probably the nicest flip flops I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I really hope these last a long time because they are so comfortable. They cost a lot, so I may never buy another pair. For now I will enjoy these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Great sandal. Only complaint is that the straps loosen rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: The Embils

customer_reviews.title: strap constantly slips
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals, just wish there was a better design on the adjustable strap. I slips and loosens constantly.
customer_reviews.author: John from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Casual water flip flop
customer_reviews.text: It was a little loose but cinch up strap and was fine.I like the fact you can tighten strap and they will stay on in water.
customer_reviews.author: blackfoot

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandal.
customer_reviews.text: I did not keep this sho from Amazon apparrel, because a different one I'd ordered fit my current need better. But it wasn't because I didn't like these. They were actually my favorite but I really needed some I could wear socks with and these have the between the toes loop. These shoes fit as expected (just my size) and they undoubtedly the most comfortable of the 3 I tried out. I had selected to try these as a backup. These appeared to be well made. So, they fit right, were very comfortable and were well made. They just weren't exactly the style I needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. HURLEY

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: These gave me multiple blisters and sores, and I wear sandals and flip flops on a regular basis with no problem. The concept and materials are pretty good but the execution failed.
customer_reviews.author: Henry E. Dorfman

product_meta.title: KEEN Solr Toe Post Walking Sandals
product_meta.description: Keen Solr Toe Post Walking Sandals When you love the freedom of flip-flops and the thrill of water sports, it helps to wear a flip that can dive in. The men's SOLR toe post sandal features recycled plastic webbing and an adjustable cross-strap. PET Webbing Upper The Keen Solr Toe Post Sandal is constructed with a low-profile design which is lightweight and flexible. The PET plastic tubular webbing upper is water resistant for durable wear, and drys quick making them ideal for active use. An adjustable cross strap allows you to create a secure and comfortable fit so that you are ready for anything. EVA Midsole An EVA midsole provides significant cushioning and comfort to help improve the level of your performance so you can stay at your optimum level, for longer. Holding excellent cushioning abilities, the midsole absorbs shocks as you move throughout the gait cycle providing resilient cushioning and reducing the risks of potential injury. The EVA footbed yields superb cushioning properties allowing you to walk further for longer. An integrated arch support provides all-day-long comfort and ensures long-lasting stability whilst a metatarsal ridge provides a natural fit. Completing the midsole is the anti-odour insole which is infused with probiotic technology that naturally breaks down odour and sweat without heavy metals or hazardous chemicals. Aquagrip Outsole This low-profile outsole is lightweight and flexible for improved ground contact, with a non-marking rubber that leaves no trace. The aqua grip rubber with aqua stop zonal siping provides maximum traction on wet surfaces, so you will be ready for any kind of adventure. The durability will withstand tricky surfaces providing a reliable sandal for high performance activities.
feature_bullets: KEEN Aquagrip, non-marking rubber with stop zonal siping provides maximum grip on slippery wet terrain and leaves no imprint when walking indoors

SUPPORT & COMFORT: These slides for men offer a comfortable and flexible traditional post that offer the freedom of flip-flops; The adjustable strap allows you to “lock-in” and pursue the thrill of water when you want to dive in; EVA midsole for enhanced, lightweight cushioning
FIT & INSOLE: This style is running true-to-size and KEEN suggests ordering your normal footwear size; Non-removable EVA footbed with added arch support for all-day comfort

CARE TIPS & ODOR PREVENTION: All KEEN water sandals are machine washable. Use a small amount of detergent, wash on gentle cycle and air dry; Includes Eco Anti-Odor, a natural, probiotic-based technology for breaking down the odor in sweat

WATER-RESISTANT UPPER: Made for the Sea, Ocean, Lake, and River (SOLR). These flip flops for men feature a recycled plastic webbing upper that is water-resistant and has a quick-dry lining for active use in and out of the water
